whatIsCreatine.title: What is Creatine?
whatIsCreatine.paragraph1: Creatine is one of the most researched supplements in the fitness industry. It helps increase strength, muscle mass, and exercise performance by providing energy to your muscles.
whatIsCreatine.paragraph2: Regular intake is key to maintaining optimal creatine levels in your muscles. That's why we created this app - to help you track your daily intake and never miss a dose.

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1Desc: Tap the button on the home screen each time you take your creatine.
howToUse.step2Desc: Enable notifications to remind you to take your supplement.
howToUse.step3Desc: View your monthly calendar to see your consistency.

dosage.title: Recommended Dosage
dosage.paragraph: The standard dosage for creatine monohydrate is 3-5 grams per day. There's no need for a loading phase, though some people prefer to start with a higher dose of 20g per day (split into 4 servings) for the first week.
dosage.disclaimer: Note: This app does not provide medical advice. Always consult with a healthcare professional before starting any supplement regimen.

actions.learnMore: Learn more about creatine at Examine.com
